protein.general_function: Involved in guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: May regulate the intracellular trafficking of RAN. In cardiac cells seems to regulate the cell surface localization of SCN5A

reference.reference_text: Marfatia KA, Harreman MT, Fanara P, Vertino PM, Corbett AH: Identification and characterization of the human MOG1 gene. Gene. 2001 Mar 21;266(1-2):45-56.
